title: Job description Parser
original_prompt:
You will be provider with the job description and you are required to analyze and parse it. Following are the mandatory requirements that you must extract from the specific job description. Provide the response in a JSON format.

Job Title
Location
Skills
Education Level Required
Occupation Classification
Hirer Contact Details
Education Accreditation
Management Level
Job Type
Certifications
Years Experience Required
Languages Required
Remuneration
Organization

{job-description:Angular Developer Skills and Qualifications Basic 2+ years of experience with complex Angular applications with Typescript Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or any other related field, or any equivalent training, or work experience 3+ years of Fullstack experience  Experience building responsive layouts with CSS and HTML. 3+ experience in Enterprise software development Familiarity and sensibilities with UX and design application and execution Strong knowledge in version control using GIT Good comprehension of server-side CSS preprocessors such as Stylus, Less Comfortable with Java, and JavaScript (workflow and decision engines). Preferred Has previous experience with Business Process Management (BPM) Has previous experience writing e2e and unit tests.) Has a good understanding/familiarity with Kafka and Mongo}
input1: {job-description: "Senior Data Scientist with a focus on machine learning and data analysis. Must have 5+ years of experience in data science roles, with a strong background in statistical modeling and predictive analytics. A Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or a related field is required. Proficiency in Python and R is essential, along with experience in SQL and big data technologies such as Hadoop or Spark. The candidate should have experience with data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI. Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure is preferred. The role requires excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team. Certifications in data science or machine learning are a plus. The position is based in New York City and offers a competitive salary package."}
input2: {job-description: "Project Manager for IT Infrastructure projects. The ideal candidate should have at least 7 years of experience in project management, specifically in IT infrastructure and cloud migration projects. A Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field is mandatory. The candidate must possess strong leadership skills and be proficient in project management methodologies such as Agile and Waterfall. Experience with tools like JIRA and Microsoft Project is required. The role demands excellent problem-solving abilities and strong communication skills. PMP or similar project management certification is preferred. The position is located in San Francisco and includes a comprehensive benefits package."}
input1_ans:

{
  "Job Title": "Senior Data Scientist",
  "Location": "New York City",
